mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.imp_id AS "impId", a.pro_category AS "proCategory", a.level AS "level", a.p_number AS "pNumber", a.p_name AS "pName", a.leader_name AS "leaderName", a.no AS "no", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.pro_source AS "proSource", a.source_project_name AS "sourceProjectName", a.source_project_type AS "sourceProjectType", a.teachers1 AS "teachers1", a.teachers2 AS "teachers2", a.teachers3 AS "teachers3", a.teachers4 AS "teachers4", a.rufu AS "rufu", a.members1 AS "members1", a.members2 AS "members2", a.members3 AS "members3", a.result AS "result", a.pro_model_md_id AS "proModelMdId", a.gnodeid AS "gnodeid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.sheet_index AS "sheetIndex"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pro_md_approval_error a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM pro_md_approval_error a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_md_approval_error( id, imp_id, pro_category, level, p_number, p_name, leader_name, no, mobile, pro_source, source_project_name, source_project_type, teachers1, teachers2, teachers3, teachers4, rufu, members1, members2, members3, result, pro_model_md_id, gnodeid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, sheet_index ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{impId}, #{proCategory}, #{level}, #{pNumber}, #{pName}, #{leaderName}, #{no}, #{mobile}, #{proSource}, #{sourceProjectName}, #{sourceProjectType}, #{teachers1}, #{teachers2}, #{teachers3}, #{teachers4}, #{rufu}, #{members1}, #{members2}, #{members3}, #{result}, #{proModelMdId}, #{gnodeid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{sheetIndex} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pro_md_approval_error SET imp_id = #{impId}, pro_category = #{proCategory}, level = #{level}, p_number = #{pNumber}, p_name = #{pName}, leader_name = #{leaderName}, no = #{no}, mobile = #{mobile}, pro_source = #{proSource}, source_project_name = #{sourceProjectName}, source_project_type = #{sourceProjectType}, teachers1 = #{teachers1}, teachers2 = #{teachers2}, teachers3 = #{teachers3}, teachers4 = #{teachers4}, rufu = #{rufu}, members1 = #{members1}, members2 = #{members2}, members3 = #{members3}, result = #{result}, pro_model_md_id = #{proModelMdId}, gnodeid = #{gnodeid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, sheet_index=#{sheetIndex} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM pro_md_approval_error t WHERE t.imp_id = #{impid} and t.sheet_index=#{sheet} order by t.create_date
